DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether additional Dexmedetomidine to patient controlled analgesia can reduce fentanyl consumption.
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of Dexmedetomidine on Postoperative Analgesia
DOC.criteria: Elective surgery for colon cancer Liver disease Kidney disease Allergy for study drugs Inability to receive patient controlled analgesia
